name: Blameless - A God Game
description:
Be the shepherd to the people and guide them to survive and thrive.
Currently the game is undergoing the transition from prototype to alpha.

Please report any bugs you find to help me improve on the game. It's just me making it so all help, comments, ratings and follows are really appreciated!

Thanks for playing,

FB

Controls:
Key	Action
WSAD	Move Camera
Q/E:	Rotate Camera
Mouse Wheel	Zoom in/out
1,2,3,4:	Change tool
M	Toggle Music
H	Move Camera towards Shrine
